00008 /// Class for each TDC measurement
00009 /// For the definition of obscure variables see the CAEN V1190 manual.
00010 class TDCMeasurement {
00011 
00012   friend class TV1190Data;
00013 
00014 public:
00015   
00016   /// Is this the leading edge measurement?
00017   bool IsLeading() const {return ((tdc_measurement_word & 0x4000000) == 0x0000000);}
00018   /// Is this the trailing edge measurement?
00019   bool IsTrailing() const {return ((tdc_measurement_word & 0x4000000) == 0x4000000);}
00020   /// Get the TDC measurement
00021   uint32_t GetMeasurement() const {return (tdc_measurement_word & 0x7ffff);}
00022 
00023 /// Get the TDC number
00024   uint32_t GetTDCNumber() const;
00025   /// Get the channel number
00026   uint32_t GetChannel() const {return ((tdc_measurement_word & 0x3f80000) >> 19 );}
00027 
00028   /// Get Event ID
00029   uint32_t GetEventID() const;
00030 
00031   /// Get Bunch ID
00032   uint32_t GetBunchID() const;
00033 
00034   /// Check if measurement has a TDC header
00035   bool HasTDCHeader() const {return (tdc_header_word != 0);}
00036   /// Check if measurement has a TDC trailer
00037   bool HasTDCTrailer() const {return (tdc_trailer_word != 0);}
00038   /// Check if measurement has a TDC error word
00039   bool HasTDCErrorWord() const {return (tdc_error_error != 0);}
00040 
00041   /// Get Errors
00042   uint32_t GetErrors() const;
00043 
00044 private:
00045 
00046   /// Found fields to hold the header, measurement, trailer and error words.
00047   uint32_t tdc_header_word;
00048   uint32_t tdc_measurement_word;
00049   uint32_t tdc_trailer_word;
00050   uint32_t tdc_error_error;
00051   
00052   /// Constructor; need to pass in header and measurement.
00053   TDCMeasurement(uint32_t header, uint32_t measurement):
00054     tdc_header_word(header),
00055     tdc_measurement_word(measurement),
00056     tdc_trailer_word(0),tdc_error_error(0){};
00057 
00058   /// Set the trailer word.
00059   void SetTrailer(uint32_t trailer);
00060 
00061   /// Set the error word.
00062   void SetErrors(uint32_t error){tdc_error_error = error;}  
00063 
00064 
00065   TDCMeasurement();    
00066 };

00069 /// Class to store data from CAEN V1190.
00070 /// We store the information as a vector of TDCMeasurement's
00071 /// Question: do we need a way of retrieving information about TDCs that
00072 /// have no measurements?  Currently this information is not exposed.
00073 /// For the definition of obscure variables see the CAEN V1190 manual.
00074 class TV1190Data: public TGenericData {
00075 
00076 public:
00077 
00078   /// Constructor
00079   TV1190Data(int bklen, int bktype, const char* name, void *pdata);
00080 
00081 
00082   /// Get Event Counter
00083   uint32_t GetEventCounter() const {return (fGlobalHeader & 0x07ffffe0) >> 5;};
00084 
00085   /// Get Geographical Address
00086   uint32_t GetGeoAddress() const {return (fGlobalHeader & 0x1f) ;};
00087 
00088   /// Get the extended trigger time tag
00089   int GetExtendedTriggerTimeTag() const {return fExtendedTriggerTimeTag;};
00090 
00091   /// Get the word count
00092   int GetWordCount() const {return fWordCount;};
00093 
00094   // Methods to check the status flags in trailer.
00095   bool IsTriggerLost() const {
00096     if(fStatus & 0x4)
00097       return true;
00098     else
00099       return false;
00100   }  
00101   bool HasBufferOverflow() const {
00102     if(fStatus & 0x2)
00103       return true;
00104     else
00105       return false;
00106   }
00107   bool HasTDCError() const {
00108     if(fStatus & 0x1)
00109       return true;
00110     else
00111       return false;
00112   }
00113 
00114 
00115   void Print();
00116 
00117   /// Get the Vector of TDC Measurements.
00118   std::vector<TDCMeasurement>& GetMeasurements() {return fMeasurements;}
00119 
00120 
00121 private:
00122   
00123   /// The overall global header
00124   uint32_t fGlobalHeader;
00125   
00126   /// The overall global trailer
00127   uint32_t fGlobalTrailer;
00128     
00129   int fExtendedTriggerTimeTag; // Extended trigger time
00130   int fWordCount; // Word count
00131 
00132   uint32_t fStatus;
00133 
00134 
00135   /// Vector of TDC Measurements.
00136   std::vector<TDCMeasurement> fMeasurements;
00137 
00138 };
